short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlessingAI Chrome Extension to provide access to BlessingAI functionality all across the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlessingAI is the perfect AI solution tailored to your individual needs. 

With BlessingAI, you can take advantage of the latest AI technology to help you create, optimize, and manage all your content with ease. 

From writing tools, image generator, video transcription, text-to-speech, speech-to-text, & SEO. BlessingAI has something for everyone. 

With BlessingAI, you can create content faster, optimize your website for higher rankings, and ensure that your content is readable and engaging. 

Get started with BlessingAI today and take your content to the next level!

How it works :
1) Simply select any online content
2) Click on Cmd+Shift+L (Mac) or Ctrl+Shift+L (Windows) or click BlessingAI icon to open BlessingAI box
3) Choose what you want to do with it (create a reply, summarize, make it shorter, etc)

The BlessingAI Chrome extension will help you:
1) Writing Tools
Improve the quality of your content with advanced features.

2) Text-to-Speech & Speech-to-Text
BlessingAI quickly and accurately produces audio and text in a variety of languages.

3) Image Generator & Optimization 
Generate high quality images for any purpose. 
New Model is available : Flux.1 (The Best AI Text to Image Generation Model)

4) Video Converter, Generator, and Transcription
Get your video transcribed with ease and accuracy.

5) Audio Generator & Transcription
Get your audio transcribed with ease and accuracy.

6) Translation
Translate your content into variety of languages.

7) Chat
Powerful chat for multiple purposes

8) Screen Recording
